citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
An attempted inspection was made at approximately 11:30 am on 9/28/15 but no one was available for the
inspection. A responsible adult must be available at time of the inspection to accompany the USDA inspector.

narrative:
2.126(a)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
An attempted inspection was made at approximately 11:30 am on 9/28/15 but no one was available for the
inspection.  A responsible adult must be available at time of the inspection to accompany the USDA inspector.
